description.@value: Looking for the EASIEST and BEST way to make mashed potatoes? Stop looking and stop guessing on how to season them! This recipe makes perfectly creamy and seasoned mashed potatoes!

recipeInstructions.@value: Clean and quarter potatoes. Peeling is optionalâ¦ but if peeling, then cut into smaller pieces.
Boil for 15-20 minutes. When they easily break apart with a fork, then theyâre ready.
Place potatoes in a large mixing bowl.
In a small pot, heat the butter, milk, salt and pepper over medium heat and stir until the butter is melted and mixed well into the milk.
While mixing the potatoes in a large upright mixer or with a handheld mixer on medium, slowly pour the milk/butter into the potatoes.
Drain in colander, and rinse with hot water (this gets the excess starch off)
